sub_title: Influencer Marketing Specialist | Business Development Manager | Web3 | Crypto | Waterpolo Player
summary:
I started my career 5 years ago. So far, I have worked with more than 500 influencers, including celebrity-macro-micro and nano. I managed the influencer processes of big brands such as Amazon, Nike, Pepsi.
 I wrote influencer fictions for brands such as BMW, McDonalds, and sent influencers to briefs and the wishes of the brand. I made Tiktok, Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn plans for social media shares. I've managed 100+ campaigns in my career.

In addition to my career, I have been playing water polo for 10 years in Galatasaray and the Turkish national team. I'm into music. I have DJ, Mixing, percussion and piano training. In addition to these, I actively organize events and organizations, allowing people to network and have fun.

I think I am a social and sincere person. If you've read this far
 Lets Connect !
